events.message: We have successfully received the candidate’s application for the software engineer position on our platform.
The applicant’s profile has been reviewed and categorised under the Engineering cluster based on keywords and experience.
A recruiter specialized in software developer roles has been assigned to manage this candidate’s hiring process.
The candidate successfully completed the initial screening call, demonstrating good understanding of software development concepts.
The candidate responded promptly and positively accepted our invitation to proceed with the technical interview stage.
The technical interview has been scheduled for May 5th, allowing the candidate to demonstrate their coding and problem-solving skills.
The candidate completed the technical interview and performed well on the coding challenge and system design discussion.
The HR interview has been scheduled following successful technical evaluation to discuss candidate’s cultural fit and compensation.
The HR interview concluded with positive feedback regarding the candidate’s communication skills and enthusiasm for the role.
An official job offer has been proposed to the candidate, including salary details and benefits for the software engineer position.
The candidate provided positive feedback about the offer and expressed eagerness to join the engineering team.
The candidate officially accepted the job offer and confirmed their start date with the HR department.
We have initiated the onboarding process for the new software engineer to integrate them smoothly into the development team.
The hiring case has been closed successfully with all stages completed and the candidate now officially part of our engineering department.
